resources.string: The first poker-like word found by researchers was found in an English dictionary of the 17th century.
According to researchers, the most gambling nation on the planet are Americans
Initially, each suit corresponded to a specific social group of citizens
Today, more than 130 varieties of poker are known.
In the late forties, card manufacturers tried to add more three suits

According to sociological research, about 75% of people on the planet continue to claim that poker is a game of chance, that is, in their opinion, there is no way to win does not depend on the level of professionalism and training of the player.
The Bird Cage Theatre in Arizona once hosted a poker game that lasted 8 years.
The very first poker chips were made from ivory, wood, clay, and bone.
January 1, 2000, was when the very first real-money online poker game was played.
Early games of poker were played with a deck of just 30 cards.
The very first time that a poker tournament was ever televised was in 1973.
The very first time that a poker tournament was ever televised was in 1973.
